infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: PixAssist needs camera access to provide viewfinder guidance overlays for better photo composition.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: PixAssist needs photo library access to save enhanced photos.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow PixAssist to access your camera for photo guidance overlays.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow PixAssist to save photos to your photo library.
plugins.savePhotosPermission: Allow PixAssist to save photos to your photo library.
